feed.title: First Time Mom & Dad
feed.subtitle: Everything new and expecting parents need to know! This website is maintained by Two confused parents & One amused baby! Hopelessly we are trying raise a baby who is clearly smarter than both of us. We invite you to learn from and laugh with us! Loads of Laughs, Fails, Photos, Reviews &Giveaways!
